Remove OpenView Monitoring Client

If you have added removeOV NIM resource while building the server, this step has been done already

  1. Stop the OVO agent
    /usr/lpp/OV/bin/ovc -kill
  2. Kill ov processes
    ps -ef | grep -i ov

    kill if there are any.

  3. Check the version
    /usr/lpp/OV/bin/opcagt -version
    1. If the version is 11.x
      1. Remove the 11.x agent
        /usr/lpp/OV/bin/OpC/install/oainstall.sh -remove -agent
      2. Delete these directories
        rm -rf /usr/lpp/OV /usr/lpp/perf /var/opt/OV /var/opt/perf
    2. If the version is not 11.x
      1. Remove the OVO agent
        /usr/lpp/perf/bin/ovpa.remove
      2. Kill perf processes
        ps -ef | grep perf
      3. Uninstall the OVO agent
        /usr/lpp/OV/bin/OpC/install/opc_inst -r
      4. Delete these directories
        rm -rf /usr/lpp/OV /usr/lpp/perf /var/opt/OV /var/opt/perf
